summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lock-in Locks two-screen mobile app. All core functionality working perfectly including form validation, navigation with state preservation, assignment progress tracking, unlock celebration, and no-persistence refresh behavior.
passed_tests: Initial load: Goal setup screen displays correctly with empty fields
Form validation: Submit button disabled when fields empty, active when all filled
Distraction field: Text input accepts user input correctly
Category dropdown: All 6 categories (üì± Phone, üéÆ Gaming, üì∫ TV, üçï Snacks, üéµ Music, üîí Other) display and selectable
Goal field: Textarea accepts multi-line input correctly
Button state transitions: Disabled (grey) ‚Üí Active (neon green) when form completed
Whitespace validation: Empty fields with only whitespace properly rejected
Submit functionality: Clicking active button triggers submission successfully
Confirmation overlay: Appears immediately showing distraction and goal with correct emojis
Confirmation content: Displays 'Locking:', 'Until:', and 'Your lock is now active' messages
Auto-routing: Confirmation shows for 2 seconds then routes to dashboard
Dashboard layout: Back button in top left, lock status banner, progress bar, assignment cards
Initial dashboard state: Shows 'LOCKED' status with red padlock, '0 of 2 assignments done'
Mock assignments: Lab 3 CMPS 101 and Problem Set 5 MATH 23A display unchecked
Assignment interaction: Checkboxes clickable and update assignment state
Progress tracking: Updates from '0 of 2' ‚Üí '1 of 2' ‚Üí '2 of 2' as assignments completed
Partial completion: Lock remains LOCKED with only 1 of 2 assignments done
Unlock trigger: Completing all assignments triggers full-screen unlock celebration
Unlock celebration: Padlock animation with glow effect and 'All done. Lock released. You earned it.' text
Auto-dismiss: Celebration disappears after 3 seconds returning to dashboard
Unlocked state: Shows green open padlock, 'UNLOCKED' text, full progress bar
Back button navigation: Returns to setup screen preserving all form values
State preservation: Form values maintained when navigating back from dashboard
Re-submission: Can submit again after returning to setup screen
Navigation persistence: Back button works correctly after unlock celebration
No localStorage: Page refresh resets everything to initial empty state
Mobile responsive: 390px mobile viewport renders and functions perfectly
All categories functional: Phone, Gaming, TV, Snacks, Music, Other all work correctly

success_percentage.backend: N/A - Frontend only with React state management
